title: Offset Interview
itunes:title: Offset Interview
description:
2-27- Today on the show we had Offset from the Migos, and we get personal. He speaks on his album, getting his wife Cardi B back, missing his father and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Mary Ann Lisanti because she referred to one of the state’s predominantly black counties as a “n—er district." Also, Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
2-27- Today on the show we had Offset from the Migos, and we get personal. He speaks on his album, getting his wife Cardi B back, missing his father and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Mary Ann Lisanti because she referred to one of the state’s predominantly black counties as a “n—er district." Also, Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
